test-case.name: op-multiply-yearMonthDuration-20
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-multiply-yearMonthDuration-20 Written By: Michael Kay Date: 5 Feb 2009 Purpose: Test rounding behaviour, FO.E12. *******************************************************

result.assert-string-value: -P4M -P3M -P3M -P1M P0M P0M P0M P1M P1M P3M P4M P4M

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-yearMonthDuration-001
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:yearMonthDuration by 0
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:integer) as xs:yearMonthDuration { xs:yearMonthDuration(concat("P", $years, "Y")) }; local:yearMonthDuration(2) * 0

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-yearMonthDuration-002
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:yearMonthDuration by 1
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:integer) as xs:yearMonthDuration { xs:yearMonthDuration(concat("P", $years, "Y")) }; local:yearMonthDuration(2) * 1

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-yearMonthDuration-003
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:yearMonthDuration by NaN

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-yearMonthDuration-004
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:yearMonthDuration by 0
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:integer) as xs:yearMonthDuration { xs:yearMonthDuration(concat("P", $years, "Y")) }; 0 * local:yearMonthDuration(2)

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-yearMonthDuration-005
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:yearMonthDuration by 1
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:integer) as xs:yearMonthDuration { xs:yearMonthDuration(concat("P", $years, "Y")) }; 1 * local:yearMonthDuration(2)

test-case.name: cbcl-multiply-yearMonthDuration-006
test-case.description: test multiplication of xs:yearMonthDuration by NaN
